mapper.select:
select
distinct
from calculate_rank
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into calculate_rank (id, content, rank_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{rankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into calculate_rank
id,
content,
rank_time,
create_time,
update_time,
#{calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{content,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{rankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update calculate_rank
id = #{record.calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=OTHER},
rank_time = #{record.rankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update calculate_rank set id = #{record.calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=OTHER}, rank_time = #{record.rankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update calculate_rank
content = #{content,jdbcType=OTHER},
rank_time = #{rankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id as calculateRankId, json_extract(content, ${pageNumStr}) as content, rank_time as rankTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id as calculateRankId, content as content, rank_time as rankTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select JSON_LENGTH(content) from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id as calculateRankId, JSON_EXTRACT(content, trim(trailing '.userAccount' from JSON_UNQUOTE(json_search(content, 'one', #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})))) as content, rank_time as rankTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id as calculateRankId, JSON_EXTRACT(content, trim(trailing '.userId' from JSON_UNQUOTE(json_search(content, 'one', #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})))) as content, rank_time as rankTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: update calculate_rank set content = JSON_ARRAY_APPEND(content, '$', JSON_OBJECT(${rankStr})) where id = #{calculateRankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update calculate_rank set content = JSON_ARRAY_APPEND(content, '$', JSON_OBJECT(${rankStr})) where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from calculate_rank where rank_time BETWEEN #{rankTimeStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{rankTimeEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
